Articles.Content:
Hello everyone! I'm Corrado, hailing from italy.

I've been playing since 0.21, but just now, seeing the birth of a little italian commmunity of ksp players on facebook, i decided to join the forum, with the objective of sharing ideas and rockets and boom! with everyone.

i've already reached the mun and minmus, now i'm assembling my first interplanetary vessel in kerbin orbit, with plans of a duna flyby mission, and maybe an ike landng.
Ah, how jolly for you to join our merry community. Welcome.
a huge Thank You to everyone for the warm welcome, Sadly my first Duna mission went bad on Kerbin atmospheric reentry, total crew loss due to staging flaw., soon i will send a new one.
Welcome aboard in the forum from another fellow italian
